message:
Roger DeHart is a well-known court bailiff. He has worked there more than 15 years. Being in the courtroom has given him a firsthand look at human trafficking victims — and the horrors that they live through. Roger DeHart, walking for a cause: “I feel like human trafficking, especially down here in Broward County, is a hush-hush topic.”
So Roger decided it was time to get people talking about it.

data.description: (WSVN) - Human trafficking arrests are on the rise across Florida, but it’s not enough to stop these heinous crimes. One South Florida man says...
data.title: Step Up: Broward bailiff plans walk to raise awareness of sex trafficking victims
